trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the persistence service cannot fulfill a request.
trans-unit.target: 지속성 서비스에서 요청을 수행할 수 없을 때 throw되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> throws a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> if it cannot complete a request to commit either a completed scope or the workflow instance state to its database.
trans-unit.target: 완료된 범위나 워크플로 인스턴스 상태를 데이터베이스에 커밋하기 위한 요청을 완료할 수 없는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>을 throw합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a persistence service by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> class, you can throw the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> with an appropriate message to indicate any error condition encountered by your service that prevents it from fulfilling a request made by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 유지 서비스를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> 클래스 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> 클래스에서 파생시켜 구현한 경우 워크플로 런타임 엔진의 요청을 수행하지 못하게 하는 서비스의 오류 조건을 나타내는 적절한 메시지와 함께 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>을 throw할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> class.
A description of the cause of the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> class by using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that holds contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 소스 또는 대상에 대한 컨텍스트 정보를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> 및 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 deserialization을 수행하는 동안 호출되어 스트림을 통해 전송된 예외 개체를 다시 구성합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=108569&clcid=0x409).
A description of the cause of the exception.
The exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" /> by using the specified message and <see cref="T:System.Exception" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지 및 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException" />을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.
